title: i feel like games are really 1 sided these days
body:
you either win really hard or lose really hard close games seem to be things that don't happen anymore and it's really frustrating.

I'm not sure what the root of the cause is but i feel as if lol is alot more one sided than it used to be.

replies.body:
I find that games become closer based on the champions, if you have an early/mid game composition and you are 3-4k gold ahead and the enemy Vayne is given 2-3 kills due to misplays on your side, the game becomes much closer... 

Or if the enemy teams composition is hard countered by your composition, but they get a 5k gold lead, it may lead to a very close game... 

Other close games happen due to one teams top and jungle doing very well, then the other teams mid/adc do really well.
Those games are usually decided based on plays made to lock down fed carries (you lose if Leona/Amumu can't lockdown their Kalista/Ahri, for example)
I get a few close games on ARAM. Mind you they're mostly one sided but still, I've had more success getting "balanced" games on ARAM than normal SR.

I had a close game as yasuo two games ago. Or at least, it felt close. the enemy got two dragons, barron, and we fought them off at our nexus turrets. we then proceeded to push them back, fight them 2 or 3 more times and win. But i do get what you mean, it's ether gg ez or surrender at 20 sort of thing.
